testcase.name: Create a unit and cross verify the detail entered
To verify validations on add unit screen
Edit an existing unit from facility detail screen and cross verify the modification
Edit an existing unit from unit detail screen and cross verify the modification
Deactivate and Activate unit from unit list screen
Deactivate user from unit detail screen and cross verify the status
Filter the unit list upon selecting status
User should be able to search when he enters the keyword and clicks on 'Filter' button
User should be able to search when he enters the keyword and hits ‘Enter’ button on keyboard
